Articles.Content:
Ok hi

you all know really awesome songs? like Tsunami or etc....

What if we had ingame music! I myself take songs and adjust the volume and make it sound awesome

pm me if you want me to fix the song or etc...

Cheers,

Jebadiah Kerban

Did you... did you scroll about halfway down the Fanworks page? I'm making songs specifically for KSP. I'm working with good ol' Blizzy78, and making a song for each of the planets. Here's the link.

I don't think I'll need your help with this (I can mix music pretty well, myself) but thanks anyway.

Upsilon's music is incredible.

Indeed it is . I'm part of that music group too (percussionist). We need more musicians and we can make a true KSP SYMPHONY! Really though.
wow heard of that group its amazing

well he my type plays any song it creates 2 folders one in and another in user/C:/kerbal space program/ game data.

the game data one allows it to play the songs and the other one you drop in your own songs

well he my type plays any song it creates 2 folders one in and another in user/C:/kerbal space program/ game data.

the game data one allows it to play the songs and the other one you drop in your own songs

So this is an addon that makes it possible to play songs in-game? Interesting.

So this is an addon that makes it possible to play songs in-game? Interesting.

well yes but i do need a programer to help since my finger got cut really bad il update this comment to show you the pic
